PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-05572022-05-26CH,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MONIKA ILLE of Westmount, Quebec, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Nature, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective June 19, 2022, in the place of Heather Holden, whose term will expire.
AttachmentsAttachment
